name: A Throne's Tale
description:
A Throne's Tale

A Throne's Tale is a retro strategy-puzzle hybrid. Lead your battalions through skirmishes, as you push back the barbarian hordes.


A Throne's Tale features many exciting features, such as:

  • Thousands of characters, each with a unique backstory that bears no impact on the game
  • Hundreds of locations with rich histories that are rarely referenced
  • A vast world with at least multiple secrets
  • Four+ bullet points
